name: Balloon POP! (baconboy90)
description:
How to play:

  • There are nine balloons.
  • One of these nine is a winner.
  • You will have three tries per game.
  • If you click on the right balloon within three shots you will win. Otherwise you will lose.

Darian, Estefany, and Rhyse are the creators of Balloon POP! Its ia a game for a class project about probability. There is a one in three chance that you will win this game.
